blogPost.excerpt: This newsletter is made with serious love. I've selected and partnered with some of the funniest indie comic artists in the world. This daily newsletter will put a smile on your face.
blogPost.body: This newsletter is made with serious love. I've selected and partnered with some of the funniest indie comic artists in the world. This daily newsletter will put a smile on your face.
blogPost.title: The Funnies - The funniest web comics delivered to your inbox
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 这篇通讯是用严肃的爱做的。我选择了一些世界上最有趣的独立漫画家并与之合作。这份每日通讯会让你脸上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 将最有趣的网络漫画发送到您的收件箱中

localize.description: 這篇通訊是用嚴肅的愛做的。我選擇了一些世界上最有趣的獨立漫畫家並與之合作。這份每日通訊會讓你臉上露出笑容。
localize.tagline: 將最有趣的網絡漫畫發送到您的收件箱中

previous.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
previous.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

next.excerpt: Post.co is the best way to share big and small news across your team. Designed as a substitute for messy threads and awkward reply-all team emails, Post is a simple, low-stakes way to share team-wide updates. Great for remote teams to stay connected.
next.title: Post - The simplest way to post big or small news across your team.

localize.description: Post.co是在您的团队中分享大小新闻的最佳方式。Post.co是一种简单的、低风险的分享团队更新的方式，它的设计可以替代混乱的线程和尴尬的团队邮件回复。非常适合远程团队保持联系。
localize.tagline: 最简单的方式在你的团队中发布大大小小的新闻。

localize.description: Post.co是在您的團隊中分享大小新聞的最佳方式。Post.co是一種簡單的、低風險的分享團隊更新的方式，它的設計可以替代混亂的線程和尷尬的團隊郵件回覆。非常適合遠程團隊保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 最簡單的方式在你的團隊中發佈大大小小的新聞。
